reviews.review: It's short and only like 5 of the puzzles are kind of difficult but it's good.
Extremely fun game with lots of fun gimmicks. I loved the original Portal game and this game was such an improvement. It has a very unique story, I absolutely fell in love with the characters in it.
this is my favorite game of all time. valve knocked this one out of the park so hard it took them 9 years to find the baseball again.

이 리뷰를 보고있다면 고민하지 말고 사
퍼즐게임 안 좋아해도 일단 사
신세계가 펼쳐질거야
Pourquoi tu lis les avis ? Oublie Fortnite et prend ce jeu tout de suite, il est génial !! (d'abord faut commencer par le 1er Portal)
Замечательная игра, полная прекрасных загадок. Порой находятся уровни, требующие до получасу времени на прохождение. Очень интересно :3 Рекомендую играть детям для развития логики.

Man, I've been watching videos about this game for a while now but i never had the encouragement to actually play it until now in 2020 which by the way sucked.  It was worth it and i wish i played it sooner the levels are creative and them robots are memorable especially at the end when- Oh i probably shouldn't spoil it for anyone (even though it was made in 2012...) I really enjoy this and still play it, and someday hope there will be a third one (Although it seems Valve can't count to three...) This is by far one of the greatest puzzle games ever!

Je ne saurais dire combien de fois j'ai fini P2 depuis qu'il est sortis.
Il était temps d'en faire une petite éval et, ces dix ans approchant, l'occasion semble propice.
Tout d'abord, il est agréable de remarquer qu'il ne vieilli pas mal graphiquement parlant. Certes les décors vous semblerons parfois simpliste au vu de ce qui est produit aujourd'hui mais jamais on ne se dira: "ouh, c'est moche ça".
Ensuite, tout comme le cousin Half Life, Portal 2 a une identité si unique et puissante qu'il ne fera jamais dans la demi mesure. On le vénère ou on le déteste, point.
Le scénario et les protagonistes sont au top, les énigmes offrent du challenge sans en être punitives etc...
Vous l'aurez compris, ce jeu je l'aime profondément.
Gros avantage du support Steam, le workshop, qui offre une rejouabilité quasi infinie avec des centaines de défis créés par la communauté, parfois avec un qualité frôlant le professionalisme, mais surtout les quelques Mods intégraux. Je ne peux ne pas citer ici "Portal Stories: Mel" qui m'a laissé sur les fesses et que je conseille à corps perdu à tous ceux qui voudraient prolonger l'expérience.
En deux mots, à moins d'être un néandertalien attardé, achetez. Il est très bon marché de base et souvent en promo donc aucune excuse de passer à côté.
Played it before, just recently played the whole story again, just as fun as the first time.  Love the narrator. Great fun game even for 2020
portal 2 is a ggood game like amazing and we all know this im jsut saying it again
i have just completed single player and i honestly love it so much. ive played both games and by far this is the best. there is a lot of content to play with and the story is amazing.
It's Portal 2, the multiplayer is the best possible part of this

Sim, Recomendo este como um dos melhores jogos que já joguei, a história e os dialogos são incríveis, uma exelente, engraçada e emocionante história

grafik: oyunun grafikleri gayet güzel. Özelliklede çıktığı dönemle kıyaslarsak gerçekten hoş grafikleri var
oynanış süresi: açıkçası ilk oyun gibi 2-3 saatte biticeğini düşünüyodum fakat 16 saatte bitirdim oyun gayet  uzun bir oyun
bulmacalar ve zorluğu: oyunun gayet zevkli ve bir o kadarda zor bulmacaları var bir bulmaca üçün yaklaşık 1 saat uğraştığım oldu
hikaye:oyun ilk oyuna göre çok daha güzel ve uzun bir hikaye barındırıyor
oyunun iyi yönleri:
oyun uzun bir oyun
grafikler hoş
buga rastlamadım
hikaye çok güzel
bulmacalar çok güzel
eksileri:
açıkçası bir eksiğini görmedim 
not: bu oyunu oynamdan önce ilk oyunu oynamanızı tavsiye ediyorum yoksa hikayeyi anlayamazsınız

son olarakda şunu eklemek istiyorum portalın 2 oyununuda tavsiye ediyorum bence herkesin oynamasası gerekwn oyunlardan birisi alın oynayın ztn indirimlerle 1 tl ye düşüyor

Played through the single player on a single day, but it was a lot more content than Portal 1 had, it was great fun, and with multiplayer and community made chambers, there's still a lot to do before I can put this game aside.
Before playing, I would recommend checking out Portal 1. Especially in the beginning you will re-visit rooms from part one and the story makes a lot more sense if you know the details of what happend before.
All in all, a solid 8.5/10, the game still has it flaws, but you might want to find out yourself.
best game i have ever played.

Игра поражает свойм сюжетом и трудностью прохождения. При прохождений игры вы чувствуете только позитивные эмоций.Игра полезна тем, что оно развивает способность думать в очень неприятных обстоятельствах.
Weathley is in SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE, Anyway fun game
I love the graphics and there are so many little details that I noticed the second time I played it that I didn't notice the first time.
If they one day increase the price of this game to 19,99€ - Just know that... It would still be worth all the money,
I love the personal touches of giving the various automations personalities.
Fantastic Game, Highly Recommended, But, I Wouldn't Recommend It For Newcomers
one of the best games i ever played in my live

I have apparently played this for 12 hours. All of this was multiplayer with my son. I probably should have played the single player campaign first so that when he yells out "left click here, right click there" I actually would have known what he was talking about. 
I still don't know what he's talking about.

In one line: You feel clever by completing the levels.
Old but gold, still one of the most fascinating games as about the riddles and the gameplay.
Good game, even if it is pretty old. Story is great and Co-op is tons of fun (if you have friends). Still waiting for a 3rd valve game so this will do.
Brilliant game. Funny and witty writing.

Amazing game to grow up with.

Wait? You mean to tell me you've never played Portal 2!? WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU!? The part 2 to the classic Portal, has loads more puzzles, an amazing 2 player map set, and a player made maps. Plus the world-building and story add to the original very well. Highly recommend. Grab a dual portal device and get in here! Mass lunacy awaits!
